IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO BE THE PREMIER PROVIDER OF ACCESSIBLE, COST EFFECTIVE, AND QUALITY BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE SERVICES TO THE RESIDENTS OF BROWARD COUNTY, IN ORDER TO PROMOTE THEIR MENTAL HEALTH AND WELL BEING.
IRS990.MissionDescription: HENDERSON MENTAL HEALTH CENTER, INC. AND SUBSIDIARIES (THE ORGANIZATION) PROVIDES BEHAVIORAL HEALTH CARE THROUGHOUT BROWARD AND PALM BEACH COUNTIES, FLORIDA. THE ORGANIZATION CHARGES FEES BASED UPON ITS PATIENTS ABILITY TO PAY FOR CLINICAL SERVICES AND RECEIVES GRANTS, CONTRACTS AND CONTRIBUTIONS FROM VARIOUS GOVERNMENTAL AND CHARITABLE AGENCIES. GIFTS, DONATIONS AND VOLUNTEER SERVICES ARE ALSO RECEIVED FROM INDIVIDUALS AND CORPORATIONS.
IRS990.Description: MENTAL HEALTH CARE PROVIDED TO A DESIGNATED CATCHMENT AREA SPECIFICALLY FOR THE POPULATION WHICH COULD NOT OTHERWISE AFFORD THE CARE.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: INTENDED TO BE USED TO SUSTAIN OPERATIONS, AND PURCHASING POWER FOR A LONG TERM BASIS AND CONTINUE THE TAX EXEMPT PURPOSE OF THE ORGANIZATION.
UNREALIZED GAIN <LOSS> ON SECURITIES: -30358. PRIOR YEAR GRANT: 24330.
RENTAL EXPENSES: 490575. RENT PAID TO WHOLLY OWNED LLC: 745414. SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSE: 36415.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE GOVERNING IS PROVIDED A COPY OF THE FORM 990 FOR REVIEW BEFORE IT IS SUBMITTED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION AT LEAST ANNUALY, HOLDS A COMPLIANCE COMMITTEE MEETING AND REQUIRES ALL GOVERNING MEMBERS TO DISCLOSE AND ISSUES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AN INDEPENDENT INDIVIDUAL OR GROUP REVIEWS COMPARABLE COMPENSATION DATA THAT IS REVIEWED WHEN CONSIDERING COMPENSATION OF KEY EMPLOYEES AND OTHER TOP MANAGEMENT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UNPON REQUEST.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: PROVIDE FACILITIES TO ELDERLY AND HANDICAPPED INDIVIDUALS.
